sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.ORGANIZATION_ID, T.STU_ID, T.STU_CARD_ID, T.STU_CODE, T.STU_NAME, T.STU_SCHOOL, T.STU_CLASS FROM clw_xc_student_t T WHERE T.stu_name like '%$stu_name$%' and T.stu_code like '%$stu_code$%' and T.stu_school like '%$stu_school$%' and T.stu_class like '%$stu_class$%' and T.organization_id in (select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi
where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id# ) and right_num <= (select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id# ))
and T.VALID_FLAG != '1'

SELECT count(1) FROM clw_xc_student_t T WHERE T.stu_name like '%$stu_name$%' and T.stu_code like '%$stu_code$%' and T.stu_school like '%$stu_school$%' and T.stu_class like '%$stu_class$%' and T.organization_id in (select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi
where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id# ) and right_num <= (select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id# ))
and T.VALID_FLAG != '1'

SELECT T.USER_ID, T.LOGIN_NAME, T.LOGIN_PWD, T.USER_TYPE, T.USER_NAME, T.USER_SEX, to_char(T.USER_BIRTH,'yyyy-mm-dd') USER_BIRTH, T.USER_COUNTRY, T.USER_PROVINCE, T.USER_CITY, T.USER_MOBILE, T.USER_OFFICE_TEL, T.USER_EMAIL, T.USER_IDT_CARD, T.ENTERPRISE_ID, T.ORGANIZATION_ID, T.USER_DUTY, T.CREATER, T.CREATE_TIME, T.MODIFIER, T.MODIFY_TIME, T.VALID_FLAG, T.VASET_USER_ID, T.VASET_TIME, T.STUDENT_PWD, T.STUDENT_FLAG, show_names_fun(T.ENTERPRISE_ID,T.ORGANIZATION_ID) ORGANIZATIONNAME FROM CLW_JC_USER_T T
WHERE T.VALID_FLAG != '1'
T.VALID_FLAG=#validFlag#
and T.ORGANIZATION_ID in
(select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id#) and right_num <=(select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id =#organization_id#) )
T.ORGANIZATION_ID in
(select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organizidtreeID#) and right_num <=(select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id =#organizidtreeID#) )
t.creater <> 'yutongsuperadmin'
T.LOGIN_NAME like '%' || #loginName# ||'%' escape '\'
T.USER_ID=#userID#
AND T.APPLY_ID = '1'
$sortname$ $sortorder$

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLW_JC_USER_T T WHERE T.VALID_FLAG != '1'
T.VALID_FLAG=#validFlag#
and T.ORGANIZATION_ID in
(select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id#) and right_num <=(select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id =#organization_id#) )
T.ORGANIZATION_ID in
(select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organizidtreeID#) and right_num <=(select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id =#organizidtreeID#) )
t.creater <> 'yutongsuperadmin'
T.LOGIN_NAME like '%' || #loginName# ||'%' escape '\'
T.USER_ID=#userID#
AND T.APPLY_ID = '1'
$sortname$ $sortorder$

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLW_JC_USER_T T
WHERE T.VALID_FLAG != '1'
and T.LOGIN_NAME = #loginName# and T.USER_TYPE!='2' and T.USER_TYPE!='0'
and T.ENTERPRISE_ID=#entiID#
AND T.APPLY_ID = '1'
select count(*) from CLW_JC_ROLE_RIGHT_T where MODULE_ID = #module_id# and ROLE_ID in ($roleids$)
sqlMap.update: update CLW_JC_USER_T set LOGIN_NAME = #loginName#, USER_NAME = #userName#, USER_SEX=#sex#, USER_BIRTH = to_date(#birthday#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), USER_COUNTRY =#countyID#, USER_PROVINCE = #provinceID#, USER_CITY=#cityID#, USER_MOBILE=#moblie#, USER_OFFICE_TEL=#tel#, USER_EMAIL=#email#, USER_IDT_CARD=#idCard#, USER_DUTY=#duty#, ORGANIZATION_ID=#organizationID#, MODIFIER=#modifier#, MODIFY_TIME=sysdate, USER_TYPE=#userType# where USER_ID = #userID#
UPDATE CLW_JC_USER_T T SET T.STUDENT_PWD = #student_pwd#, T.STUDENT_FLAG = #student_flag# WHERE T.USER_ID = #userId#
update CLW_JC_USER_T set VALID_FLAG=#valideFlg# where USER_ID = #userID#
sqlMap.select: select t.USER_ID,t.ROLE_ID,t.ENTERPRISE_ID,t.APPLY_ID,t.CREATER,t.CREATE_TIME,r.ROLE_NAME from CLW_JC_USER_ROLE_T t,CLW_JC_ROLE_T r where t.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID and t.USER_ID=#userID#
select t.PR_USERID,t.STU_ID,t.STU_NAME from clw_xc_st_pr_t t where t.pr_userid=#userID#

SELECT T.USER_ID, T.LOGIN_NAME, T.LOGIN_PWD, T.USER_TYPE, T.USER_NAME, T.USER_SEX, to_char(T.USER_BIRTH,'yyyy-mm-dd') USER_BIRTH, T.USER_COUNTRY, T.USER_PROVINCE, T.USER_CITY, T.USER_MOBILE, T.USER_OFFICE_TEL, T.USER_EMAIL, T.USER_IDT_CARD, T.ENTERPRISE_ID, T.ORGANIZATION_ID, T.USER_DUTY, T.CREATER, T.CREATE_TIME, T.MODIFIER, T.MODIFY_TIME, T.VALID_FLAG, T.VASET_USER_ID, T.VASET_TIME, T.STUDENT_FLAG, show_names_fun(T.ENTERPRISE_ID,T.ORGANIZATION_ID) ORGANIZATIONNAME FROM CLW_JC_USER_T T WHERE T.USER_ID = #userID# AND T.VALID_FLAG = '0'
sqlMap.update: update CLW_JC_USER_T set USER_NAME = #userName#, USER_SEX=#sex# ,USER_BIRTH = to_date(#userBirth#,'yyyy-mm-dd') ,USER_COUNTRY =#countyID#, USER_PROVINCE = #provinceID#, USER_CITY=#cityID#,USER_MOBILE=#moblie#,USER_OFFICE_TEL=#tel#,USER_EMAIL=#email#,USER_IDT_CARD=#idCard#, MODIFIER=#modifier#,MODIFY_TIME=sysdate where USER_ID = #userID#
UPDATE CLW_JC_USER_T T SET T.STUDENT_PWD = #password# WHERE T.USER_ID = #userId#
UPDATE CLW_JC_USER_T T SET T.LOGIN_PWD = #password# WHERE T.USER_ID = #userId#
